comments:
Background
----------
Was making another attempt to get EAR deployment working here.

The bea.wlw.server adapter code try to obtain a list of child from a EAR.


   // ...
        // return itself for top level module
        IEnterpriseApplication ea =
(IEnterpriseApplication)module.getAdapter(IEnterpriseApplication.class);
		if (ea==null)
            return EMPTY_MODULES;
        
        IModule[] nested = ea.getModules();
   // ...

ArrayStoreException is thrown.


Patch
-------
Line 83 should be callling FlexibleProjectServerUtil.getModule() instead. And,
the method need to be made public.


class EnterpriseApplicationDeployable {
    // ...

    public IModule[] getModules() {

            // ...
            for (Iterator iter = components.iterator(); iter.hasNext();) 
            IVirtualReference reference = (IVirtualReference) iter.next();
            IVirtualComponent virtualComp = reference.getReferencedComponent();

line: 83 
-             Object module =
FlexibleProjectServerUtil.getModuleDelegate(virtualComp);
+             Object module = FlexibleProjectServerUtil.getModule(virtualComp);
            modules.add(module);
        }

        // ...
        IModule[] moduleArray = new IModule[modules.size()];
        modules.toArray(moduleArray);
